_header: Saint Luke us witness in this stead
_description: Gospel for Tuesday after Easter in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint Luke vs wittnes in þis stedeWhen ihesu crist was resin fra dede…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …þus sall ȝe to þe pople sayWhen þis was done he went away
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Stetit ihesu crist in medio discipulorum.”
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.184-186.
